alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 23 at 1:27PM MST until February 25 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 MPH with gusts up to 65 MPH possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County. * WHEN...From Friday evening through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. Patchy blowing snow will create slick roadways.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County
